about_the_game:
"Better Than Dead" plunges you into the raw, unforgiving streets of Hong Kong, a city seething with the undercurrents of extreme anger and thirst for vengeance. Drawing inspiration from the intense, dark world of Asian bloodshed films, the game paints a narrative of a protagonist consumed by a quest for revenge.
Here, every shadow whispers tales of betrayal and loss, and each action you take is a step along a path lined with the consequences of past grievances.
As you navigate this world, your story unfolds – one where the echoes of a painful past fuel a present filled with rage and retribution.



  • Brutal, Realistic Combat: Experience combat in its most raw form. No health bars, no abstract metrics – only visceral, lifelike action where survival depends on your quick reflexes and strategic decisions.
  • Photorealistic Hong Kong: Step into a city rendered with stunning realism. Every street, every alley, tells a part of your story, set against the backdrop of iconic Hong Kong.
  • Narrative of Vengeance: At the core of your journey is a tale of revenge, a path that tests your resolve and forces you to confront the cost of your quest.

Key Features:

  • Unforgiving Gunplay: Engage in shootouts where precision is key, and the cost of missing your target could mean endangering innocents.
  • Cinematic Aesthetics: The game's visual style and narrative tone are deeply influenced by the gritty essence of Asian action cinema, transporting you into a world that feels both cinematic and real.
  • Impact of Every Bullet: In "Better Than Dead," the true cost of a bullet goes beyond its target. Every shot fired holds the potential for unintended consequences, adding a critical layer of weight and decision-making to every combat scenario.
  • Deep, Immersive Storyline: Delve into a narrative where your drive for revenge shapes the course of your journey and the world around you.
